column1: Bihariganj (Vidhan Sabha constituency) (Hindi: बिहारिगंज विधान सभा निर्वाचन क्षेत्र) is an assembly constituency in Madhepura district in the Indian state of Bihar.
As per Delimitation of Parliamentary and Assembly constituencies Order
column3: No. 71 Bihariganj (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is composed of the following: Bihariganj and Gwalpara community development blocks; Biriranpal
column8: Barahi Anadpura and Pipra Karoti gram panchayats of Uda Kishunganj CD Block; Gram Panchayats Haripur Kala
column18: and Rampur gram panchayats and Murliganj notified area of Murliganj CD Block.Biharganj (Vidhan Sabha constituency) is part of No. 13 Madhepura (Lok Sabha constituency).

column2: Renu Kumari Kushwaha of JD(U) won the newly created Bihariganj assembly seat defeating her nearest rival Prabhash Kumar of RJD.
